title: Grilled Summer Vegetables With Garlic Vinaigrette
sub_head: Eggplant, peppers, onions, tomatoes and Romano beans cook quickly and look beautiful, layered in an appealing crosshatch pattern. A punchy garlic vinaigrette pulls together this meatless-grilling grand slam.
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
